review: I visited the doctor for tooth sensitivity. He was polite and patient to explain the root cause and next steps involved.

My first dental visit was made comfortable. I was having a missing teeth he replaced it with artificial teeth . I highly recommend him he listens to u gives 2 or 3 options to go with and he performs it without any pain. I felt really comfortable.

I came to dr.Madhukaran for my tooth ache he advised me to go for rootcanal treatment. I was scared at first but he made sure it was painless. He listened to my problems and gave me various options to go with. Ian satisfied with his work. I highly recommend him.

My tooth extraction was painless, I really appreciate his patience to listen to our problems and spending his time to explain the issue and the treatments . I highly opt him for dental treatment. Thank you doctor.
I visited clinic for Root canal treatment, he made me to feel much comfortable and his friendly move made the process much ease. Would definitely recommend him for my family and friends..
